content:
[Amber Case](http://caseorganic.com/) [talks](http://caseorganic.com/notes/2013/10/22/2/realtimeconf-indieweb-ownyourdata) about the #indieweb at #realtimeconf covering the origins of the community and exactly why you should want to own your own data too. Inspiring stuff and reminds me to get back to hacking on #baker

<iframe src="//player.vimeo.com/video/77352414" width="588" height="330" frameborder="0" webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen allowfullscreen></iframe>
